src:
Så mye tjente RBKs største stjerner – to spillere i egen klasse
05 Nov 2019, 07:54 by Ole K. Sagbakken,Christian Skare Stendal
Nicklas Bendtner tjente nær ni millioner kroner i 2018.
Blant annet på grunn av sign-on-fee tjente Nicklas Bendtner rekordhøye 20 millioner kroner i sin første RBK-sesong.
text:
So much earned RBK's biggest stars - two players in their own class
05 Nov 2019, 07:54 by Ole K. Sagbakken, Christian Skare Stendal
Nicklas Bendtner earned near $ 9 million in 2018.
Partly because of the sign-on fee, Nicklas Bendtner earned a record high of NOK 20 million in his first RBK season.
